Compare multiple ROC curves using DeLong's test

Source: R/meddecide-utils.R
delong_test.Rd

Compare multiple ROC curves using DeLong's test

DeLong's test for comparing ROC curves

Usage

delong_test(roc1, roc2)

delong_test(roc1, roc2)

Arguments

roc1

First ROC curve data

roc2

Second ROC curve data

test_data

List of test results

paired

Logical indicating whether tests are paired

Value

A list containing test results with the following components:

overall

Overall test results including chi-square statistic and p-value

pairwise

Matrix of pairwise comparison p-values

aucs

Vector of AUC values for each test

covariance

Covariance matrix of the tests

List containing test statistic and p-value
